item.title: Hidden Markov Models in C++
item.description: In this post, we’ll explore the math behind Hidden Markov Models (or HMMs), and then work through a practical implementation, which the Magical Wheel of Languages™ says will be in C++. You can find the final implementation here. We’ll be explaining everything from fundamentals for this, so you shouldn’t need any preexisting knowledge (other than working knowledge of C++). That said, a basic grounding in probability may help you grasp the concepts more easily.
